data.title: Audi Dealer in Manhattan NY
data.meta_description: Our Audi dealership always has a wide selection and low prices. Visit us and test drive a new or used Audi in New York at Audi Manhattan. Contact us today!
data.text:
Welcome to Audi Manhattan

At Audi Manhattan, we are proud to serve the automotive needs of drivers throughout the New York City area. At our respected car and SUV dealership, you will always receive the highest level of customer service from our courteous, knowledgeable associates. We maintain solid standards for client satisfaction across all of our departments, so you can expect a smooth, hassle-free experience every time you visit our dealership.

We've got a huge selection of new Audi vehicles including models like the Audi A3, Audi A4, Audi A5, Audi Q3, Audi Q5, Audi Q7, Audi Q8, and more. If you're interested in an all-electric luxury vehicle, our options include the Audi Q4 e-tron, Audi e-tron GT, Audi e-tron, and more. Visit our Audi flagship dealership in the heart of New York City to find your next Audi vehicle! We're conveniently located at 800 11th Avenue at 55th Street, and we're only a short distance from Long Island, New Jersey, and the Bronx. Our dealership happily services customers from New York City, Jersey City, Long Island, Newark, Union City, Yonkers, and the surrounding communities.

Audi Leasing & Auto Financing

Our dealership offers online financing tools, so you can easily get started from the comfort of your own home. You can even value your trade-in vehicle online. Regardless of the Audi model that you have your eye on, setting up an auto loan or lease with manageable monthly payments is easy. Leasing your next Audi allows you to move into one of our latest models every few years. Leases can include additional benefits and flexible terms to suit your lifestyle and needs. On the other hand, taking out a new loan gives you a chance to one day own your Audi outright and drive it without a monthly payment. Buying an Audi with a loan also means your vehicle will not have mileage restrictions. Get complete details about your options when you apply for auto financing using our secure online form.

Certified Pre-Owned Audi Vehicles & Used Cars

Are you thinking about sliding behind the wheel of a well-equipped, pre-owned vehicle soon? We've got a fantastic selection of Certified Pre-Owned Audi vehicles, so you can enjoy driving a more recent model with some of the latest features. Our dealership also maintains a wide variety of used cars and SUVs. Our pre-owned inventory receives new additions regularly, so you can always have access to various models when you shop at Audi Manhattan. Our sales team is standing by to support you with your search.

Audi Service, Repairs, and Parts

At our Audi service center, you can access high-quality automotive care at our convenient location. You can access our climate controlled service reception area from either 55th or 56th street. Certified Audi specialists staff our large facility, and once you arrive, you'll be met by one of our greeters or service advisors. Oil changes, brake service, battery replacements, and transmission services are just a few of the services we offer. Schedule your Audi service appointment online today!

Are you looking for model-specific parts for your Audi? We can help you locate the exact parts you need, or we can order them for quick delivery if we don't have them in stock. Simply contact our Audi parts and accessories department for help today!

Contact Audi Manhattan Today

Our Audi dealership is located on Manhattan's west side, and our helpful staff are ready to assist you with all of your automotive needs. Our Audi Manhattan associates can help answer any questions you may have about purchasing a new Audi or a used car, setting up financing, or scheduling Audi service. We understand your car or SUV's importance to your daily routine, and we are ready to assist with all of our auto needs. Visit us soon, give us a call, or contact us online for assistance.
